name: Juble Jam
description:
A multiplayer holiday-themed FPS battle arena prototype. Mostly I’m learning what Unity + networking elements looks like. Right now it's very basic, but you can log in and pelt your friends with snowballs!

Controls

WASD - move

Shift(hold) - run

MouseL - fire / MouseR(hold) - gather snow

Space - jump

Tab - toggle leaderboard

Notes

The free version of Photon (networking tool) caps out at 20 users. So far it's only been tested with 3. Levels aren't really designed to handle > 10.

This is a learning project. I haven't smoothed a lot of things out but if there's interest, I'm not opposed to revisiting it!
